remarks: Condition for parallel product when the last argument is not an ordered pair.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:
brpprod3.1 $e |- X e. _V $.
brpprod3.2 $e |- Y e. _V $.
brpprod3.3 $e |- Z e. _V $.
brpprod3a $p |- ( <. X , Y >. pprod ( R , S ) Z <-> E. z E. w ( Z = <. z , w >. /\ X R z /\ Y S w ) ) $.
$d R w z $.
$d S w z $.
$d X w z $.
$d Y w z $.
$d Z w z $.
